io.werval.api.context

Interface Context


  • public interface Context
    HTTP Interaction Context.

    Accessible using CurrentContext.get() and other static helpers in CurrentContext.

    • Method Summary

      • executor

        ExecutorService executor()
        Current Executor.

        Convey the current Context to parallel threads.

        Use when composing CompletableFutures or to submit paralled Stream operations.

        Returns:
        Current Executor
